src:
Prediksi Chelsea vs Ajax Amsterdam 6 November 2019
04 Nov 2019, 16:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kemenangan di Belanda telah membawa Chelsea memiliki poin sama dengan Ajax Amsterdam. Kali ini, di kandang sendiri, The Blues memburu kemenangan demi coba meninggalkan pesaing-pesaingnya. Namun, jika mempertimbangkan motivasi Ajax untuk melakukan pembalasan, kemenangan sepertinya tak bakal mudah didapatkan.
Chelsea akan menjamu Ajax Amsterdam di Stamford Bridge pada matchday 4 Grup H Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Pada matchday sebelumnya, yang merupakan pertemuan perdana mereka, Chelsea menaklukkan Ajax 1-0 di Amsterdam. Gol tunggal pemain pengganti Michy Batshuayi memastikan pasukan Frank Lampard pulang membawa poin maksimal.
Chelsea sekarang memiliki enam poin, sama dengan Ajax. Mereka berdua unggul dua poin atas Valencia di peringkat tiga, dan lima poin atas Lille di posisi terbawah.
Akhir pekan kemarin, Chelsea mengalahkan tuan rumah Watford 2-1 di Premier League. Chelsea menang melalui gol-gol Tammy Abraham dan Christian Pulisic.
Ajax sendiri sudah cukup siap untuk lawatan ke Inggris ini. Modalnya adalah kemenangan tandang kontra PEC Zwolle lewat masing-masing dua gol Quincy Promes dan David Neres di Eredivisie.
text:
Predictions of Chelsea vs Ajax Amsterdam 6 November 2019
Nov 04 2019, 16:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Victory in the Netherlands has led Chelsea to have the same points with Ajax Amsterdam. This time, at home, the Blues are chasing victory for trying to leave their competitors. However, if you consider Ajax's motivation for retaliation, victory is unlikely to be easy to obtain.
Chelsea will host Ajax Amsterdam at Stamford Bridge on Matchday 4 Group H Champions League 2019/20, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
On the previous matchday, which was their first meeting, Chelsea conquered Ajax 1-0 in Amsterdam. Single goal substitute Michy Batshuayi ensured Frank Lampard's men returned home with maximum points.
Chelsea now have six points, equal to Ajax. They both are two points ahead of Valencia in third place, and five points ahead of Lille in the lowest position.
Last weekend, Chelsea defeated host Watford 2-1 in the Premier League. Chelsea won through goals from Tammy Abraham and Christian Pulisic.
Ajax itself is quite ready for this trip to England. The capital is an away win against PEC Zwolle through each of the two goals of Quincy Promes and David Neres in the Eredivisie.
